text: Yeroo sana Ayyaanni mana qulqullummaa haaromsuu10:22 Ayyaanni mana qulqullummaa haaromsuu Hanukkaajedhamee beekama – Jiʼi Hanukkaa Sadaasaa wajjin tokkuma. Ayyaanni kunis guyyaa itti Yihuudaa Maqaabiis (dhaloota Kiristoos dura bara 164 keessa) mana qulqullummaa kan namoonni Sooriyaa waggaa sadii xureessan sana haaromse yaadachuuf godhame. Ayyaanichis guyyaa digdamii shanaffaa jiʼa sanaa irraa jalqabee hamma guyyaa saddeetiitti ayyaaneffama ture. Yeroon kun Yihuudootaaf yeroo gammachuu guddaa ture. Yerusaalemitti ayyaaneffamee ture. Yeroon sunis ganna ture;
